source.query:
SELECT 
    a.id,
    a.user_id,
	COALESCE(a.name, '') AS name_on_card,
    COALESCE(a.cc_type, '') AS scheme,
    CASE 
        WHEN a.cc_type = 'MADA' THEN 'mada'
        ELSE ''
    END AS scheme_local,
	COALESCE(a.gateway_payment_profile_id, '') AS instrument_id,
	a.last_digits,
	a.month,
	a.year,
    a.updated_at,
    a.created_at,
	'CREDIT' as card_type
FROM   
    spree_credit_cards a
where user_id is not null
and gateway_customer_profile_id is not null
ORDER BY 
    id ASC;
select max(updated_at) as max_updated_date from checkout_cards

query.value:
SELECT 
    a.id,
    a.user_id,
	COALESCE(a.name, '') AS name_on_card,
    COALESCE(a.cc_type, '') AS scheme,
    CASE 
        WHEN a.cc_type = 'MADA' THEN 'mada'
        ELSE ''
    END AS scheme_local,
	COALESCE(a.gateway_payment_profile_id, '') AS instrument_id,
	a.last_digits,
	a.month,
	a.year,
    a.updated_at,
    a.created_at,
	'CREDIT' as card_type
FROM   
    spree_credit_cards a
where user_id is not null
and gateway_customer_profile_id is not null
and a.updated_at > '@{variables('max_updated_date')}'
ORDER BY 
    id ASC;

source.query:
select distinct lower(sst.name) as name,
		 ss.country_id,
		 ss.created_at,
		ss.updated_at,
    	true AS is_visible,
    	ds.state_id
from danube_supermarkets ds 
join spree_states ss on ss.id = ds.state_id 
join spree_state_translations sst on sst.spree_state_id = ss.id and sst.locale = 'en';

Alter sequence city_id_seq restart with 1;
Select 'Altering Sequence ID' as Update;

SELECT a.id,
       a.iso3 AS iso_country_code,
       a.name,
       a.currency,
       a.updated_at,
       COALESCE(a.created_at, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) AS created_at,
       a.default_supermarket_id AS default_super_market_id,
       a.currency_precision
FROM   spree_countries a;

SELECT 
  id, 
  name_en, 
  name_ar, 
  created_at, 
  updated_at, 
  sort_order as position 
FROM 
  spree_kitchen_cuisines
Order by id ASC;

select 
	dtss.id, 
	cast(dts.start_time as text) as start_time, 
	cast(dts.end_time as text) as end_time,
	CASE
		WHEN dtss.day_of_week = 0 THEN 'sunday'
		WHEN dtss.day_of_week = 1 THEN 'monday'
		WHEN dtss.day_of_week = 2 THEN 'tuesday'
		WHEN dtss.day_of_week = 3 THEN 'wednesday'
		WHEN dtss.day_of_week = 4 THEN 'thursday'
		WHEN dtss.day_of_week = 5 THEN 'friday'
		WHEN dtss.day_of_week = 6 THEN 'saturday'
	Else 'sunday'
	END AS day_of_week,
	dtss.spree_shipping_method_id as delivery_option_id,
	coalesce(ds.id,0) as supermarket_id, 
	coalesce(dtss.delivery_capacity,0) as capacity, 
	null as time_slot_id, 
	dtss.enabled as is_enabled,
	dtss.created_at,
	dtss.updated_at
from danube_time_slots_schedules dtss
left join danube_time_slots dts on dts.id  = dtss.time_slot_id 
left join danube_supermarkets ds on ds.zone_id = dtss.zone_id
order by dts.id;

query.value:
UPDATE delivery_capacity dc
SET time_slot_id = ts.id
FROM time_slot ts
WHERE dc.start_time = ts.start_time
  AND dc.end_time = ts.end_time
  AND dc.day_of_week = ts.day_of_week
  AND dc.delivery_option_id = ts.delivery_option_id;
SELECT 'Time Slots are Updated' as Time_Slot_status

source.query:
SELECT ssm.id,
       ssmt.name,
       ssm.created_at,
       ssm.updated_at,
       ssm.deleted_at
FROM   spree_shipping_methods ssm
left join spree_shipping_method_translations ssmt
on ssm.id = ssmt.spree_shipping_method_id
and locale = 'en';

INSERT INTO PUBLIC.delivery_type
            (id,
             NAME,
             created_at)
VALUES      ( 1,
              'Regular',
              '2023-02-24 07:20:04.500904' ),
            ( 2,
              'Express',
              '2023-02-24 07:20:04.500904' ); 
SELECT 'AYM' as AYMInsertActivity

with cte as(
select 
  distinct user_id,
  uuid as device_id,
  platform as device_type,
  created_at,
  updated_at,
  push_notification_token as token,
  'customer' as user_type,
  row_number() over (partition by user_id order by user_id) as rn
from spree_user_clients
order by user_id, uuid)

select user_id, device_id, device_type, created_at, updated_at, token, user_type
from cte 
where rn = 1;

SELECT u.id,
sru.role_id,
u.email,
u.created_at,
u.updated_at,
CASE
    WHEN u.deleted_at IS NOT NULL THEN TRUE
    ELSE FALSE
  END AS is_deleted,
  LEFT(COALESCE(u.first_name, ''), 40) AS first_name,
  LEFT(COALESCE(u.last_name, ''), 40) AS last_name,
  LEFT(COALESCE(CASE
    WHEN u.mobile_phone_number LIKE CONCAT(
      '+', u.mobile_number_country_code,
      '%'
      ) THEN SUBSTRING(
      u.mobile_phone_number,
      CHAR_LENGTH(u.mobile_number_country_code) + 2
      )
    WHEN u.mobile_phone_number LIKE CONCAT(u.mobile_number_country_code, '%') THEN SUBSTRING(
      u.mobile_phone_number,
      CHAR_LENGTH(u.mobile_number_country_code) + 1
      )
    ELSE COALESCE(u.mobile_phone_number, '')
  END, ''), 16) AS mobile_number,
  u.dob,
  COALESCE(
  CONCAT('+', u.mobile_number_country_code),
  ''
  ) AS country_code,
  CASE WHEN sa.country_id='0' THEN '1'
    ELSE sa.country_id
  END AS country_id,
	'others' as gender,
	'admin' as user_type,
	'available' as availability,
  sr.name as role_name,
	CASE
    WHEN u.deleted_at IS NOT NULL THEN FALSE
    ELSE TRUE
  END AS active,
	CASE
    WHEN u.deleted_at IS NOT NULL THEN FALSE
    ELSE TRUE
  END AS status,
  sa.city
from spree_users u
inner join spree_roles_users sru on sru.user_id = u.id
inner join spree_roles sr on sr.id = sru.role_id and sr.name <> 'user'
left join spree_user_addresses sua on sua.user_id = u.id and sua.default=TRUE
left join spree_addresses sa on sua.address_id = sa.id
order by u.id asc;
select max(updated_at) as max_updated_date from employee;

query.value:
SELECT u.id,
sru.role_id,
u.email,
u.created_at,
u.updated_at,
CASE
    WHEN u.deleted_at IS NOT NULL THEN TRUE
    ELSE FALSE
  END AS is_deleted,
  LEFT(COALESCE(u.first_name, ''), 40) AS first_name,
  LEFT(COALESCE(u.last_name, ''), 40) AS last_name,
  LEFT(COALESCE(CASE
    WHEN u.mobile_phone_number LIKE CONCAT(
      '+', u.mobile_number_country_code,
      '%'
      ) THEN SUBSTRING(
      u.mobile_phone_number,
      CHAR_LENGTH(u.mobile_number_country_code) + 2
      )
    WHEN u.mobile_phone_number LIKE CONCAT(u.mobile_number_country_code, '%') THEN SUBSTRING(
      u.mobile_phone_number,
      CHAR_LENGTH(u.mobile_number_country_code) + 1
      )
    ELSE COALESCE(u.mobile_phone_number, '')
  END, ''), 16) AS mobile_number,
  u.dob,
  COALESCE(
  CONCAT('+', u.mobile_number_country_code),
  ''
  ) AS country_code,
  CASE WHEN sa.country_id='0' THEN '1'
    ELSE sa.country_id
  END AS country_id,
	'others' as gender,
	'admin' as user_type,
	'available' as availability,
  sr.name as role_name,
	CASE
    WHEN u.deleted_at IS NOT NULL THEN FALSE
    ELSE TRUE
  END AS active,
	CASE
    WHEN u.deleted_at IS NOT NULL THEN FALSE
    ELSE TRUE
  END AS status,
  sa.city
from spree_users u
inner join spree_roles_users sru on sru.user_id = u.id
inner join spree_roles sr on sr.id = sru.role_id and sr.name <> 'user'
left join spree_user_addresses sua on sua.user_id = u.id and sua.default=TRUE
left join spree_addresses sa on sua.address_id = sa.id
where u.updated_at > '@{variables('max_updated_date')}'
order by u.id asc

source.query:
select 
sfdrw.id,
sur.first_name,
sur.last_name,
sur.email,
sur.mobile_number_country_code as country_code,
sur.mobile_phone_number as mobile_number,
sfdrw.comment as message,
sfdrw.created_at,
sfdrw.updated_at,
sfdrw.user_id
from spree_feedback_reviews sfdrw
Left join spree_users sur on sur.id = sfdrw.user_id;
select max(updated_at) as max_updated_date from feedback;

query.value:
select 
sfdrw.id,
sur.first_name,
sur.last_name,
sur.email,
sur.mobile_number_country_code as country_code,
sur.mobile_phone_number as mobile_number,
sfdrw.comment as message,
sfdrw.created_at,
sfdrw.updated_at,
sfdrw.user_id
from spree_feedback_reviews sfdrw
Left join spree_users sur on sur.id = sfdrw.user_id
where sfdrw.updated_at >= '@{variables('max_updated_date')}';

source.query:
select 
  id, 
  name_en, 
  name_ar, 
  taxon_id, 
  kitchen_recipe_id as recipe_id, 
  quantity, 
  COALESCE(Cast(measurement AS CHARACTER varying),'') AS measurement,
  created_at, 
  updated_at 
from 
  spree_kitchen_ingredients
order by id ASC;

select 
  -- id,
  Cast(kitchen_ingredient_id AS integer) AS ingredient_id,
  Cast(recommended_product_id AS integer) AS product_id
from spree_ingredient_products
-- order by id asc;

SELECT id,
       product_id,
       Cast(action_price as double precision),
       action_in_stock AS track_stock,
       COALESCE(rule_supermarket_id, -1) AS supermarket_id,
       created_at,
       updated_at,
	   Cast(action_sale_price as double precision) AS sale_price,
       Date(action_sale_start) AS sale_start_date,
       Substring(To_char(action_sale_start, 'HH24:MI:SS'), 1, 8) AS sale_start_time,
       Date(action_sale_end) AS sale_end_date,
       Substring(To_char(action_sale_end, 'HH24:MI:SS'), 1, 8)   AS sale_end_time,
       Date(availability_start_time) AS availability_start_date,
       -- availability_start_time (timestamp without time zone so we need to extract using string manipulation) 
       Date(availability_end_time) AS availability_end_date,
       stock_quantity,
       action_sale_price AS cost_price
FROM   spree_product_inventory_modifiers
order by id ASC;
select max(updated_at) as max_updated_date from inventory_modifiers

query.value:
SELECT id,
       product_id,
       Cast(action_price as double precision),
       action_in_stock AS track_stock,
       COALESCE(rule_supermarket_id, -1) AS supermarket_id,
       created_at,
       updated_at,
	   Cast(action_sale_price as double precision) AS sale_price,
       Date(action_sale_start) AS sale_start_date,
       Substring(To_char(action_sale_start, 'HH24:MI:SS'), 1, 8) AS sale_start_time,
       Date(action_sale_end) AS sale_end_date,
       Substring(To_char(action_sale_end, 'HH24:MI:SS'), 1, 8)   AS sale_end_time,
       Date(availability_start_time) AS availability_start_date,
       -- availability_start_time (timestamp without time zone so we need to extract using string manipulation) 
       Date(availability_end_time) AS availability_end_date,
       stock_quantity,
       action_sale_price AS cost_price
FROM   spree_product_inventory_modifiers
where updated_at > '@{variables('max_updated_date')}'
order by id ASC;
